summary: This is an email chain regarding an update on the Epstein Estate, sent by Marc A. Weinstein to Andrew Tomback on November 9, 2020. The document appears to be a forwarded or embedded message, but the main body text is not provided in the given excerpt.

persons.name: Marc A. Weinstein

persons.name: Andrew Tomback
persons.context: Appears as a recipient (Cc) of an email regarding the Epstein Estate update.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated November 9, 2020, concerning an update on the Epstein Estate.
Marc A. Weinstein is the sender, and Andrew Tomback is a recipient of the email.
The email subject and embedded file reference 'Epstein Estate update', indicating ongoing financial or legal matters related to Jeffrey Epstein's estate after his death.
